title: UkeySoft Apple Music Converter
description:
UkeySoft Apple Music Converter is a professional software that can convert Apple Music songs, playlists to MP3, WAV, M4A, FLAC effortlessly. Convert your Apple Music to MP3 for offline listening now!

Features:
Convert Apple Music to MP3/AAC/WAV/FLAC/AIFF/M4A format.
Download songs, playlist and albums from Apple Music.
Support 16X faster conversion speed.
Preserve the original audio quality and ID3 tags after conversion.
Built-in Apple Music web player, no need to install other app.
